item.title: Imaginary Ctf 2022 Pwn Writeup
item.description: My team purf3ct cleared the pwn section of this ctf, so for the first time, I feel qualifed enough to make a writeup about 2 heap challenges, which introduce some nice heap exploitation techniques

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: $ whoami
item.description: Computer Science undergrad student at University of Engineeering and Technology I have been learning about Binary Exploitation since the beginning of this year, hopefully will get better soon Interested in technology in general You can randomly find me in SEA Valorant, at the bottom rank of course About this blog, currently it consists of writups (and my failure)
